comments:
Calling createDataObject with a bogus feature name results in a 
NullPointerException.It should throw an IllegalArgumentException.


java.lang.NullPointerException
       at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.util.SDOUtil.createDataObject
(SDOUtil.java:610)
       at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.impl.EDataObjectImpl.createDataObject
(EDataObjectImpl.java:1174)
       at 
com.ibm.ws.mediator.jdbc.tests.genquery.SimpleWrites.testInsertOrderDetails
(SimpleWrites.java:162)
The fix is available in the latest 2.0 integration driver.
